gurmukhi: AdÍYQ hYN AByQ hYN AlyK nwQ jwnIAY ]
transliteration: Advaikh Hain Abhekh Hain Alekh Naath Jaanooain||
translation: He is without malice, without guise, and is known as the Accountless Master.

gurmukhi: sdIb srb Taur mY ibsyK Awn mwnIAYN ]4]164]
transliteration: Sadoov Sarab Thaur Mai Bisekh Aan Maanooain||4||164||
translation: He may especially be considered abiding for ever in all the places. 4.164.

gurmukhi: n jMqR mY n qMqR mY n mMqR bis AwveI ]
transliteration: Na Jantra Mai Na Tantra Main A Mantra Bas(i) Aavaee||
translation: He is not within Yantras and tantras, He cannot be brought under control through Mantras.

gurmukhi: purwn AO kurwn nyiq nyiq kY bqwveI ]
transliteration: Puraan Au Kuraan Net(i) Kai Bataavaee||
translation: The Puranas and the Quran speak of Him as ‘Neti, Neti’ (infinite).

gurmukhi: n krm mY n Drm mY n Brm mY bqweIAY ]
transliteration: Na Karam Main A Dharam Main A Bharam Mai Bataaooai||
translation: He cannot be told within any Karmas, religions and illusions.

gurmukhi: AgMj Aid dyv hY kho su kYs pweIAY ]5]165]
transliteration: Agadj Aadh Dev Hai Kaho Su Kais Paaiai||5||165||
translation: The Primal Lord is Indestructible, say, how can He be realized? 5.165.

gurmukhi: ijmI jmwn ky ibKY smsiq eyk joiq hY ]
transliteration: Jimoondjamaan Ke Bikhai Samast(i) Ek Jot(i) Hai||
translation: Within all the earth and sky, there is only one Light.

gurmukhi: n Gwit hY n bwiF hY n Gwit bwiF hoq hY ]
transliteration: Na Ghaattee Hai Na Baadh(i) Hai Na Ghnttee Hot Hai||
translation: Which neither decreases nor increases in any being, It never decreases or increases.

gurmukhi: n hwn hY n bwn hY smwn rUp jwnIAY ]
transliteration: Na Haan Hai Na Baan Hai Samaan Roop Jaanooai||
translation: It is without decadence and without habit, it is known to have the same form.

gurmukhi: mkIn AO mkwn ApRmwn qyj mwnIAY ]6]166]
transliteration: Makoon Au Makaan Apramaan Tej Maanooai||6||166||
translation: In all houses and places its unlimited brilliance is acknowledged. 6.166.

gurmukhi: n dyh hY n gyh hY n jwiq hY n pwiq hY ]
transliteration: Na Deh Hai Nag Eh Hai Na Jaat(i) Hai Na Paat(i) Hai||
translation: He hath no body, no home, no caste and no lineage.

gurmukhi: n mMqR hY n imqR hY n qwq hY n mwq hY ]
transliteration: Na Mantra Hai Na Mitra Hai Na Taat Hai Na Maat Hai||
translation: He hath no minister, no friend, no father and no mother.

gurmukhi: n Amg hY n rMg hY n sMg swQ nyh hY ]
transliteration: Na An Hai Na Ran Hai Na San Saath Neh Hai||
translation: He hath no limb, no colour, and hath no affection for a companion.

gurmukhi: n doK hY n dwg hY n dÍYK hY n dyh hY ]7]167]
transliteration: Na Dokh Hai Na Daag Hai Na Dvaikh Hai Na Deh Hain||7||167||
translation: He hath no blemish, no stain, no malice and no body.7.167.
